item.title: Senate fails to advance GOP bill to end shutdown for 13th time
item.description: The Senate failed for a 13th time on advancing a GOP funding bill that would end the government shutdown, now on Day 28. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Senate Democrats to force vote aimed at blocking Trump's tariffs on Brazil
item.description: The Senate is expected to vote Tuesday on a measure that would block President Trump's tariffs on Brazil, as Democrats seek support from a handful of ...

item.title: Obesity rate is declining as more Americans use weight loss drugs, survey finds
item.description: As more Americans turn to weight loss drugs, the U.S. adult obesity rate​ is declining, according to new survey data from Gallup​.

item.title: Melissa is one of the strongest hurricanes recorded in the Atlantic
item.description: Hurricane Melissa​, which struck Jamaica as a Category 5, is among the strongest hurricanes to have formed in the Atlantic since records were kept.

item.title: Gold's price plunges below $4,000. Here's how investors can take advantage.
item.description: Gold's price continued to decline this week. Here's how investors can take advantage of this timely opportunity.
